level.heading: Prohibitions.
level.text: It shall be unlawful for a health insurer to eliminate or restrict the availability of a health insurance plan offered in the District with the intent of shifting beneficiaries to the Program. An entity found to be in violation of this section shall be subject to a fine of not less than $10,000.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-219, see notes following ยง 4-631.
